name: Once Ever After
description:
(NOTICE: This page exists to follow the development of a project that will not be available for a long time. All screenshots reflect an early stage of development and include many placeholders, particularly mapping and UI.)

Everyone knows how the story goes: innocent, 18-year-old Red Riding Hood goes into the woods and is corrupted the naughty, naughty Big Bad Wolf. Ingrid is the newest Little Red Riding Hood: she doesn't know what awaits her in the dark woods, but she knows that it seems exciting.

But Ingrid's world is only one of an infinite number of Tales, and those stories are starting to bleed over into one another. War is coming, and Ingrid doesn't even know what war is. Nothing will ever be the same, and the only weapon Ingrid has to face the changes is sexy fun.Features
  • A 10-20 hour RPG across multiple alternate fairy tales.
  • 20+ base scenes with 100+ images total.
  • All characters have access to multiple classes and skill trees that can be mixed and matched.
  • Visible enemies instead of random encounters.
  • Optional post-game challenges leading to second ending.
